# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #90](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#90)

#### J. Dauro

Do we know anything on how they managed to create the wards on
*Callandor*
, and attune them to Rand?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I don't.

#### J. Dauro

Then I guess I'll have to ask Maria at JordanCon.
